CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to Crimson Plate?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {above} Crimson Plate in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {above} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Bistro relative to The Cozy Nook?
SRP.A: Stellar Bistro is {below} The Cozy Nook in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Bistro}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food cost percentage?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Emerald Diner}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Emerald Diner's maximum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Emerald Diner's maximum Food Cost Percentage is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Bistro's minimum Food Cost Percentage in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Bistro's minimum Food Cost Percentage is in {1981}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1989, did the total Food Cost Percentage experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total food cost percentage between 1985 and 1989 was {smaller} than between 1981 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1985, was the average total Food Cost Percentage higher or lower than between 1986 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total food cost percentage between 1983 and 1985 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1982 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1982 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Cost Percentage in 1986 higher or lower than in 1987?
NC.A: The total food cost percentage in 1986 was {higher} than in 1987.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Stellar Bistro} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did The Cozy Nook and Emerald Diner first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: The Cozy Nook and Emerald Diner did not exchange leading positions.
